recentChanges.summary: {"what_changed":"The download link for the Claude app has been updated with a new redirect URL.","change_type":"update","change_scale":"minor","specific_changes":["Updated download link for Claude app from https://claude.ai/redirect/website.v1.f1d860cf-d18a-4694-bb3d-9d8f5920d73d/download to https://claude.ai/redirect/website.v1.e0360d15-f344-4083-ad78-29350c54037c/download","Example use case changed from 'build a bedtime story app' to 'debug a wedding website'"]}

{"what_changed":"Addition of new news articles and removal of old ones, update of featured news section","change_type":"update","change_scale":"significant","specific_changes":["Addition of 'Thoughts on America’s AI Action Plan' article","Removal of 'Anthropic Economic Index: AI’s impact on software development' from featured section","Update of 'Introducing Claude 4' article"]}

{"what_changed":"Addition of new news articles and updates to existing ones, including announcements, product updates, and policy changes","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"significant","specific_changes":["New partnership with the University of Chicago's Becker Friedman Institute on AI economic research","Introduction of Claude for Financial Services","Advancements in Claude for Education","Expansion of Claude for Enterprise use by Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory","Appointment of Paul Smith as Chief Commercial Officer","Introduction of the Anthropic Economic Futures Program"]}

{"what_changed":"New article 'Build AI in America' added, and 'No results found' message removed","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"minor","specific_changes":["Added new article 'Build AI in America' on Jul 21, 2025","Removed 'No results found' message from news section"]}

{"what_changed":"Addition of a new policy announcement: Anthropic to sign the EU Code of Practice","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"minor","specific_changes":["New policy announcement added to the news section","No other significant changes to the content or structure"]}

{"what_changed":"Initial content creation for Anthropic documentation","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"major","specific_changes":["Introduction of navigation menu with links to Research, Login, Support, and Sign up","Addition of sections for Developer Platform, Claude Code, Model Context Protocol (MCP), API Reference, Resources, and Release Notes","Inclusion of quickstart guides, reference documentation, and release notes for Claude Code","Links to external resources such as Anthropic Courses, Anthropic Cookbook, and Anthropic Quickstarts"]}

{"what_changed":"New homepage content with updated product information, research highlights, and company commitments","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"major","specific_changes":["Introduction of Claude Opus 4 and Sonnet 4 models","Updated research section with new projects and publications","Emphasis on AI safety and responsible scaling policy","New career opportunities and contact sales information"]}

{"what_changed":"New content added to the news section of Anthropic's website, including announcements, product updates, and policy changes.","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"significant","specific_changes":["Introduction of Claude 4","Appointment of Paul Smith as Chief Commercial Officer","Introduction of the Anthropic Economic Index","Expansion of Claude for Enterprise use by Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory","Introduction of web search on the Anthropic API","Appointment of Guillaume Princen as Head of EMEA","Introduction of Claude for Education"]}

{"what_changed":"Introduction of a new pricing page for Anthropic's Claude AI model","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"major","specific_changes":["New pricing plans introduced: Free, Pro, Max, Team, and Enterprise","Pricing details for each plan, including features and limitations","Introduction of a comprehensive university-wide Education plan","Pricing for latest models: Claude Opus 4, Claude Sonnet 4, and Claude Haiku 3.5","Pricing for tools, including web search and prompt caching"]}

{"what_changed":"New content introduction for Anthropic's product Claude","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"major","specific_changes":["Introduction of Claude as a thinking partner","Details about Claude's capabilities and features","Information on how to use Claude for various tasks","Introduction of Claude Opus 4 and Sonnet 4 models","Availability of Claude on web, desktop, and mobile platforms"]}

{"what_changed":"New content added to the GitHub blog, including various categories and subcategories related to AI, ML, developer skills, engineering, enterprise software, news, and security.","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"major","specific_changes":["Added AI & ML category with subcategories for generative AI, GitHub Copilot, LLMs, and machine learning","Added Developer skills category with subcategories for application development, career growth, GitHub, GitHub Education, and programming languages & frameworks","Added Engineering category with subcategories for architecture & optimization, engineering principles, infrastructure, platform security, and user experience","Added Enterprise software category with subcategories for automation, CI/CD, collaboration, DevOps, DevSecOps, and governance & compliance","Added News & insights category with subcategories for company news, product news, Octoverse, policy, and research"]}

{"what_changed":"Initial documentation release for GitHub Copilot","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"major","specific_changes":["Release of comprehensive documentation for GitHub Copilot","Introduction of various guides, tutorials, and how-to sections for users","Detailed information on plans, features, and best practices for GitHub Copilot"]}

{"what_changed":"Introduction of GitHub Copilot, a new AI-powered developer tool, with various features, pricing plans, and integrations with popular IDEs and platforms","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"major","specific_changes":["Introduction of GitHub Copilot as a new AI-powered developer tool","Various pricing plans, including Free, Pro, and Pro+","Integration with popular IDEs and platforms, such as Visual Studio Code, Visual Studio, JetBrains IDEs, and Neovim","Features like code completions, chat assistance, code explanations, and answers to documentation"]}

{"what_changed":"New articles and updates were added to the Google Blog, including 'Ask a Techspert: What is inference?', 'Find out the latest Gemini updates with Gemini Drops', 'Check out the first images of wildfires detected by FireSat', and 'Try on styles with AI, jump on great prices and more'","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"significant","specific_changes":["Added new article 'Ask a Techspert: What is inference?'","Added new article 'Find out the latest Gemini updates with Gemini Drops'","Added new article 'Check out the first images of wildfires detected by FireSat'","Added new article 'Try on styles with AI, jump on great prices and more'"]}

{"what_changed":"New articles and updates were added to the Google Blog, including 'Ask a Techspert: What is inference?', 'Find out the latest Gemini updates with Gemini Drops', 'Turn your photos into videos in Gemini', 'Check out the first images of wildfires detected by FireSat', 'How we built one of the most ambitious datasets in brain activity research', 'Google Beam: Our AI-first 3D video communication platform', 'New in Gemini Code Assist: Agent Mode and IDE enhancements', 'Gemini CLI: your open-source AI agent', 'Gemini Code Assist adds Gemini 2.5, personalization and context management', 'Listen to a conversation about the newest AI capabilities in Search', 'Transform your photos into videos and remix your pics in Google Photos'","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"significant","specific_changes":["Added new articles under 'AI', 'Gemini App', 'Research', 'Developers', and 'All the Latest' sections","Updated Gemini Code Assist with new features","Introduced Gemini CLI as an open-source AI agent","Announced the first images of wildfires detected by FireSat","Published a podcast about the newest AI capabilities in Search"]}
